about_the_game:
The music of the King of Darkness

Aeterna Noctis - Concert of the Night is a collection of the 12 songs players can perform on the piano during the adventure through an intuitive mini-game. These are the scores composed by the King of Darkness himself a long time ago!

You will find 12 unique piano covers in high quality, MIDI files of these 12 tracks, and the complete sheet music of each track.

An ideal complement for lovers of the wonderful soundtrack of Aeterna Noctis!
